properties.description: Creates a lakehouse table from ADLS data

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'venkyfs1001_venkyadls1001_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [venkyfs1001_venkyadls1001_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://venkyfs1001@venkyadls1001.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.air_quality_temperatures (
	[latitude] float,
	[longitude] float,
	[time] nvarchar(4000),
	[temperature_2m] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'AirQualityIndexWithTemp/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [venkyfs1001_venkyadls1001_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.air_quality_temperatures
GO
